Hi everyone. I am new to the Heritrix project and looking forward to
use th=
is software for a personal projet. However, I have been trying
to set up my=
 Eclipse development environment for the past few hours
without success. Yo=
ur help would be greatly appreciated.

Here is my setup: Ubuntu / JDK Java =
6 update 10 / Eclipse / M2Eclipse.

Here is what I've been trying to do:

1=

"https://archive-crawler.svn.sourceforge.net=
/svnroot/archive-crawler/release-branches/heritrix-2.0.1".

2. I go to Ecli=

heritrix-2.0.1 folder.

en download/installs all the dependencies.
